mapper.select: select count(*) from BOARD_TB where bbs_clsf_cd = #{bbs_clsf_cd} and pdt_id = #{pdt_id}
select bbs_id, bbs_title, wrt_dt, user_nm from BOARD_TB where bbs_id=#{bbs_id}
select bbs_id, pdt_id, user_id, bbs_title, wrt_dt, user_nm from BOARD_TB ORDER BY bbs_id DESC ,wrt_dt DESC
mapper.sql: select REVIEW_BOARD_TB.bbs_id, revw_like, revw_img, pdt_id, user_id, bbs_title, wrt_dt, user_nm, bbs_clsf_cd from REVIEW_BOARD_TB right join BOARD_TB on REVIEW_BOARD_TB.bbs_id = BOARD_TB.bbs_id where pdt_id = #{pdt_id} and bbs_clsf_cd = #{bbs_clsf_cd}
mapper.select: order by bbs_id desc, wrt_dt desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
order by revw_like desc, bbs_id desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD_TB (pdt_id, user_id, bbs_title, user_nm, bbs_clsf_cd, in_user, up_user) values (#{pdt_id}, #{user_id},#{bbs_title}, #{user_nm},#{bbs_clsf_cd}, #{user_id}, #{user_id})
insert into REVIEW_BOARD_TB (bbs_id, in_user, up_user) values (#{bbs_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_id})
insert into BOARD_CONTENT_TB (bbs_id, bbs_cn, in_user, up_user) values (#{bbs_id}, #{bbs_cn}, #{user_id},#{user_id})
insert into USER_LIKE_NO (user_id, bbs_id, like_no, in_user, up_user) values (#{user_id}, #{bbs_id}, #{like_no}, #{user_id}, #{user_id})
